channel.description:
[center][b][u][url=http://enriched.grn.cc/webclient.jar]UPDATED LINK: Download webclient.jar[/url][/u][/b][/center] [center][b][u][url=http://enriched.grn.cc]Play Now[/url][/u][/b][/center]
[center][img]http://fc08.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/291/f/a/765_by_majin_gfx-d83cabl.jpg[/img] [img]http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/291/0/6/home_by_majin_gfx-d83996p.png[/img] [img]http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/291/c/b/skills_by_majin_gfx-d83997d.png[/img] [img]http://fc05.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/291/8/0/quests_by_majin_gfx-d83997a.png[/img] [img]http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/291/3/9/minigamestz2_by_majin_gfx-d839975.png[/img] [img]http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/291/d/4/working_minigames_by_majin_gfx-d83997k.png[/img] [img]http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/291/2/b/minigamestz_by_majin_gfx-d83996x.png[/img] [img]http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2014/291/4/c/bossing_by_majin_gfx-d83995w.png[/img] [img]http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2014/291/3/6/godwars_by_majin_gfx-d83996k.png[/img] [center][b][u][url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/hsvlbl9mm5dcae1/EnrichedEco.rar]UPDATED LINK: Download webclient.jar[/url][/u][/b] [/center] [/center][center][b][u][url=http://enriched.grn.cc]Play Now[/url][/u][/b][/center]
To Stop this from happening please follow these steps: [img]http://i.imgur.com/CQvVK6T.png[/img]
1. Go to your start menu 2. Search up configure Java or Java Control Panel< 3. Go to the Security table 4. Press Edit Site List, Press add, then put in http://enriched.grn.cc/ 5. Restart or Refresh web client. 6. Allow through web browser such as google chrome. 7. Enjoy. If any problems persist please contact me on forums thanks.
Thanks

item.title: [Beta] Enriched - Purely Economic [OSEco]
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Mikeyzzz, post:20, topic:547346”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=666253.msg4454451#msg4454451 date=1413807942]
Merp. I just downloaded Java update, redownloaded jar and it still isn’t working.
[/quote]I wish I knew why maybe this is why there is only a few players on. Can anyone think of a reason why this might be happening?[/quote]

Please play the webclient,

and follow these instructions for it to work online:

  1. Go to your start menu
  2. Search up configure Java or Java Control Panel<
  3. Go to the Security table
  4. Press Edit Site List, Press add, then put in http://enriched.grn.cc/
  5. Restart or Refresh web client.
  6. Allow through web browser such as google chrome.
  7. Enjoy any problems please contact me on forums thanks.

Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: [Beta] Enriched - Purely Economic [OSEco]
item.dc:creator: @Mikeyzzz Mikeyzzz
item.description:
@Mikeyzzz wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:5, topic:547346”][quote author=Mikeyzzz link=topic=666253.msg4454367#msg4454367 date=1413759700]

“Java Exception has occured” when executing jar file.
[/quote]Try updating java if that happens.

Also the[quote author=Elrick link=topic=666253.msg4454304#msg4454304 date=1413730788]
Also how is your economy going to function with so many NPCs? They appear to be shops, which in a way defeats the purpose of players using skills to obtain a majority of the item tiers. Depending on how close to you want to follow the ECO model of a server, I would suggest you guys try to create areas that allow players to obtain equipment and materials to make the economy functioning on its own.
[/quote] In relation to those shops, majority only supply items that are needed to train core skills in order to start to build bank. But I do like the idea of adding separate areas to obtain certain items, which I am considering.

I will try to provide more specific feedback when I get on, but yeah. I would hope to see “lore friendly” material as well, as in not seeing things out of place or too easy (banking right next to resources, unnecessarily large clusters, etc.). I definitely think that providing players with money making opportunities is important, but you have to find the balance of making gp worth something, making resources worth something, and making use of those resources worth using.

Like I said though, I currently do not have a baseline of how easy or hard the server is.[/quote]I currently do have banks near resources, which if the player base find out of place or too easy, will be removed. Making Mills is difficult, make 100k is rather more easier, if that makes sense. Hop on when you can give me ideas, I’d love to grow and improve.

Read full topic

Also how is your economy going to function with so many NPCs? They appear to be shops, which in a way defeats the purpose of players using skills to obtain a majority of the item tiers. Depending on how close to you want to follow the ECO model of a server, I would suggest you guys try to create areas that allow players to obtain equipment and materials to make the economy functioning on its own.
[/quote] In relation to those shops, majority only supply items that are needed to train core skills in order to start to build bank. But I do like the idea of adding separate areas to obtain certain items, which I am considering.[/quote]
I will try to provide more specific feedback when I get on, but yeah. I would hope to see “lore friendly” material as well, as in not seeing things out of place or too easy (banking right next to resources, unnecessarily large clusters, etc.). I definitely think that providing players with money making opportunities is important, but you have to find the balance of making gp worth something, making resources worth something, and making use of those resources worth using.

Like I said though, I currently do not have a baseline of how easy or hard the server is.

Read full topic

Also how is your economy going to function with so many NPCs? They appear to be shops, which in a way defeats the purpose of players using skills to obtain a majority of the item tiers.
